commit.message:
decl2.c (output_vtable_inherit): Use %cDIGIT in the operands.

	* decl2.c (output_vtable_inherit): Use %cDIGIT in the operands.
	* class.c (build_vtable_entry_ref): Likewise.

From-SVN: r22161

files.patch:

+
+	* decl2.c (output_vtable_inherit): Use %cDIGIT in the operands.
+	* class.c (build_vtable_entry_ref): Likewise.

 	* cp-tree.h (DECL_FRIEND_PSEUDO_TEMPLATE_INSTANTIATION): New macro.
